channel.title: Xmodmap on Torwald Log
channel.description: Recent content in Xmodmap on Torwald Log

item.title: Make Chromebook Super_L key Control
item.description: âžœ ~ xmodmap xmodmap: up to 3 keys per modifier, (keycodes in parentheses): shift Shift_L (0x32), Shift_R (0x3e) lock Caps_Lock (0x42) control Control_L (0x25), Control_R (0x69) mod1 Alt_L (0x40), Alt_R (0x6c), Meta_L (0xcd) mod2 Num_Lock (0x4d) mod3 mod4 Super_L (0x85), Super_L (0xce), Hyper_L (0xcf) mod5 ISO_Level3_Shift (0x5c), Mode_switch (0xcb) Copy current xmodmap config: xmodmap -pke > ~/.xmodmap Do its backup just in case cp ~/.xmodmap ~/.xmodmap.bak Drop Super_L from mod4:
